content.description: Scout and research knowledge gaps for Phase 4.2: Sovereign Trinity Hardening (Service Discovery & Failover + Query Flow Integration). Identify specific hardening targets for Ryzen 7 5700U host and Rootless Podman environment.
requirements: Research Consul/Eureka integration patterns for rootless Podman
Analyze failover scenarios for RAG API and Redis in a 6.6GB RAM environment
Identify bottlenecks in end-to-end query flow (STT -> RAG -> TTS)
Draft a preliminary hardening spec for Sovereign Trinity
